title: Fuzzy Bunny’s Guide to You-Know-What
description: Troy McClure is here to provide the facts about sex in a frank and straightforward manner.
quote: And now that you know how it’s done, don’t do it.
altHero: Fuzzy and Fluffy Bunny walking through the park and holding balloons
alt1: Troy McClure sitting in a doctor’s office
alt2: Fuzzy next to text: voice changing, acne, more fur
alt3: Fuzzy and Fluffy falling in love while bowling
alt4: Fuzzy and Fluffy with 14 baby bunnies
